name: 林敬皇
objective:
本課程旨在探討人工智慧在跨域資安上的應用。課程將從零信任安全、人工智慧安全、個人資料與隱私保護、人工智慧在資訊安全事件的偵測、人工智慧在舞弊的偵測、人工智慧輔助電腦稽核、人工智慧輔助數位鑑識以及 API 安全等議題進行深入探討。首先，課程將介紹零信任安全的概念，探討如何使用此方法來保障資料安全，並深入探討其相關技術及應用案例。課程還將探討人工智慧在安全的應用，以及如何使用人工智慧技術進行網路安全防禦。在隱私保護方面，介紹有關個人資料與隱私保護的法律、標準與指引，以及如何在人工智慧應用中保護個人資料和隱私。課程也將深入探討人工智慧在資訊安全事件的偵測方面，介紹如何使用人工智慧技術檢測網路攻擊，包括異常檢測、入侵檢測等技術。
This course aims to explore the application of artificial intelligence in cross-domain cybersecurity. It will delve into topics such as zero trust security, AI security, personal data and privacy protection, AI in the detection of information security incidents, AI in fraud detection, AI-assisted computer auditing, AI-assisted digital forensics, and API security. Initially, the course will introduce the concept of zero trust security, discussing how to use this method to ensure data security, and will explore its related technologies and application cases in depth. The course will also examine the application of AI in security, and how to use AI technologies for network security defense. In terms of privacy protection, it will cover laws, standards, and guidelines related to personal data and privacy protection, as well as how to protect personal data and privacy in AI applications.
